entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. 40 percent chance of flurries near Gold River in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
